section_title:
10d03 - Suits by Federal, State and local government
employees under Sec 16(b).
text:
Sec 16(b) of the FLSA and Sec 6 of the Portal Act provide
that employees of a public agency may sue for BW’s in any Federal or State
court of competent jurisdiction for themselves or other employees.
html: Sec 16(b) of the FLSA and Sec 6 of the Portal Act provide that employees of a public agency may sue for BW’s in any Federal or State court of competent jurisdiction for themselves or other employees.
